typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	SrcSchemaName as string,
	SrcTableName as string
}
source(output(
		{Shipment ID} as string,
		Trans as string,
		{Origin ETD} as string,
		{Destination ETA} as string,
		{Weight (kg)} as string,
		{Volume (m3)} as string,
		Inner as string,
		UQ_3 as string,
		Outer as string,
		UQ_4 as string,
		Added as string,
		{Consignor City} as string,
		{Consignor State} as string,
		{Consignor Postcode} as string,
		{Consignee City} as string,
		{Consignee State} as string,
		{Consignee Postcode} as string,
		{Consol ATD} as string,
		{Consol ATA} as string,
		{Job Revenue Recognition Date} as string,
		Direction as string,
		{Overseas Agent Code} as string,
		{Overseas Agent Name} as string,
		{House Bill Type} as string,
		{Origin Location} as string,
		{Destination Location} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
